entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.1.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: allow secret creation for signed in users by @bjarneo in https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/pull/354

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.1.1...v6.1.2

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.1.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/HemmeligOrg/Hemmelig.app/compare/v6.1.2...v6.1.3

entry.title: New release for Hemmelig: v6.1.4
